Author: insanityiskey85
Name: AI Companion
Description: Private AI chat window. Persona via persona.txt, optional memories.json, color themes (Void Touched), and optional Party/Say routing with trigger + whitelist. Sentence-aware streaming and queued dispatcher for stable outbound chat. Channel bridge mirrors Say/Party into the Companion window with manual Post to /say or /party buttons.
